channel.title: About on Zekai Lu
channel.description: Recent content in About on Zekai Lu

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Zekai Lu is a social science researcher from China who is currently a senior student in the Department of Sociology at Guangzhou University.His areas of interest include medical sociology, social psychology and computational sociology.Zekai hopes to focus on the field of medical sociology in his future PhD research.Zekai has already published many works on some English and Chinese journal. Zekai’s favourite poem is by Du Fu, 窗含西岭千秋雪，门泊东吴万里船。 Research Interest Sociology: Medical sociology;Computational sociology; Media Sociology and Gender sociology.
